tool_description: Obtain weather forecast and forecast for diverse cities.
name: Vision Weather Map
title: Vision Weather Map

api_list.name: View  from 16 day / daily forecast dates
api_list.description: 16-day forecasts are available in any location or city. Forecasts include the daily weather and are available in JSON or XML format. It is only available for all paid accounts.

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: You can use different types of metric systems by units = metric or imperial

optional_parameters.name: mode
optional_parameters.description: mode - possible values are JSON xml. If mode parameter is empty the format is JSON by default.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: You can use the lang parameter to get the output in your language. We support the following languages, which you can use with the corresponding lang values: Arabic - ar, Bulgarian - bg, Catalan - ca, Czech - cz, German - de, Greek - el, English - en, Persian (Farsi) - fa, Finnish - fi, French - fr, Galician - gl, Croatian - hr, Hungarian - hu, Italian - it, Japanese - ja, Korean - kr, Latvian - la, Lithuanian - lt, Macedonian - mk, Dutch - nl, Polish - pl, Portuguese - pt, Romanian - ro, Russian - ru, Swedish - se, Slovak - sk, Slovenian - sl, Spanish - es, Turkish - tr, Ukrainian - ua, Vietnamese - vi, Simplified Chinese - zhcn, Traditional Chinese - zhtw.

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: city name and country code divided by comma, use ISO 3166 country codes

optional_parameters.name: lon
optional_parameters.description: Must be used with lat. Get current weather data when you know the longitude of the city.

optional_parameters.name: cnt
optional_parameters.description: amount of days in the future to forecast

api_list.name: Climate forecast for 30 days
api_list.description: With the climate forecast for 30 days you can request weather data for the next 30 days. This product is based on a statistical approach for our historical weather data and is updated every hour.

api_list.name: 5 day / 3 hour forecast data
api_list.description: The 5-day forecast is available in any location or city. It contains weather data every 3 hours. The forecast is available in JSON or XML format.

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: {city name}, {country code} - city name and country code divided by comma, use ISO 3166 country codes

api_list.name: Current Weather Data
api_list.description: With this type of request you can get weather data anywhere on earth. The current weather data is updated online based on data from more than 40,000 weather stations.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: use this parameter when searching for a city. Do not use with other parameters

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: You can use the lang parameter to get the output in your language. We support the following languages, which you can use with the corresponding lang values: English - en, Russian - ru, Italian - it, Spanish - sp, Ukrainian - ua, German - de, Portuguese - pt, Romanian - ro, Polish - pl, Finnish - fi, Dutch - nl, French - fr, Bulgarian - bg, Swedish - se, Traditional Chinese - zht, Simplified Chinese - zhcn, Turkish - tr

optional_parameters.name: mode
optional_parameters.description: If left blank will default to JSON output. Ability to retrieve data in XML or HTML.

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: You can use different types of metric systems by units = metric or imperial

optional_parameters.name: lon
optional_parameters.description: Must be used with lat. Get current weather data when you know the longitude of the city.

optional_parameters.name: lat
optional_parameters.description: Must be used with lon. Get current weather data when you know the latitude of the city.

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: Get current weather data when you know the city ID. Not to be used with lon, lat, or q
